// ================================================================= // Program: LangEn - the content of all web pages in English // Author : Bill Huang // Date : Oct 19 - Dec 18, 2019 // ================================================================= const en_US = { hello: "Hello！", // Office website // ============== // Header of the office website ft_header_fantuan: "Fantuan", ft_header_about: "About", ft_header_newsroom: "Newsroom", ft_header_career: "Careers", ft_header_language: "中文", // Footer of the office website ft_footer_ftdelivery: "Fantuan Delivery", ft_footer_ftdianping: "Fantuan Dianping", ft_footer_aboutus: "About Us", ft_footer_newsroom: "Newsroom", ft_footer_careers: "Careers", ft_footer_contactus: "Contact Us", ft_footer_policy: "Privacy Policy", ft_footer_partner: "Partner", ft_footer_driver: "Driver", ft_footer_suggest: "All suggestions and inquiries, please email", // Office website - about // ---------------------- // About of the office website ft_about_best_p1: "The Best", ft_about_best_p2: "Asian Food", ft_about_best_p3: "Delivery", ft_about_best_btn: "Visit Website", // about fantuan ft_about_fantuan_title: "About Fantuan", ft_about_fantuan_text: "Fantuan was founded in Vancouver, Canada in 2014. It is a one-stop life-services platform providing food delivery, reviews (Fantuan Reviews), errand services (Fantuan Rush), e-commerce and marketing services. Fantuan is one of the top Asian life-services platforms in North America, currently covering Vancouver, Toronto, Edmonton, Calgary, Montreal, Seattle, Los Angeles, New York and other metropolitan areas across Canada and the US.", // history ft_about_history_title: "Fantuan's Milestones", ft_about_history_year0: "2014 - Nov", ft_about_history_title0: "Fantuan was founded", ft_about_history_text0: "Fantuan was founded in Vancouver, Canada, setting up its first office in the city of Burnaby", ft_about_history_text01: "I'm an amazing optional text", ft_about_history_year1: "2016 - Sep", ft_about_history_title1: "Expanded to Toronto", ft_about_history_text1: "Fantuan completed its first ever expansion to Toronto, Canada", ft_about_history_year2: "2017 - Apr", ft_about_history_title2: "Launched self-pickup service", ft_about_history_text2: "Allows users to disregard delivery fees and tips by picking up their orders from the restaurants", ft_about_history_year3: "2018 - Sep", ft_about_history_title3: "Launched Fantuan Reviews", ft_about_history_text3: "A leading consumer review and coupon platform based on merchant information and user feedback", ft_about_history_year4: "2018 - Dec", ft_about_history_title4: "Raised seed round", ft_about_history_text4: "Fantuan received funding from well-known Silicon Valley funds", ft_about_history_year5: "2019", ft_about_history_title5: "Expanded to Seattle", ft_about_history_text5: "Fantuan completed its first ever expansion to the US, starting with Seattle", ft_about_history_title6: "Expanded to Los Angeles & New York City", ft_about_history_text6: "Fantuan launched its services in Irvine, California (LA region) and Flushing, NY (NYC region)", ft_about_history_title7: "Launched English app", ft_about_history_text7: "Fantuan released the English version of its app in Vancouver, allowing English speakers to use Fantuan’s services for the first time", // contact us ft_about_contactus_title: "Contact Us", ft_about_contactus_text: "Fantuan is established in various major cities across the US and Canada, please find your local office for any inquiries.", ft_about_contactus_country1: "CANADA", ft_about_contactus_country2: "United States", // Office website - newsroom // ------------------------- // newsroom ft_news_title: "Fantuan News", ft_news_contact: "Advertising information please contact us pr@fantuan.ca", ft_news_viewmore: "View more", ft_news_path_home: "Home", ft_news_path_newsroom: "Newsroom", ft_news_path_newsdetail: "News details", // Delivery - header & footer // ========================== // Header of the delivery fd_header_partner: "Partner", fd_header_deliver: "Driver", fd_header_language: "中文", // Footer of the delivery fd_footer_dianping: "饭团点评", fd_footer_aboutus: "About Us", fd_footer_newsroom: "Newsroom", fd_footer_career: "Carees", fd_footer_contactus: "Contact Us", fd_footer_faq: "FAQ", fd_footer_policy: "Privacy Policy", fd_footer_partner: "Partner", fd_footer_driver: "Driver", fd_footer_suggest: "All suggestions and inquiries, please email", // Delivery - Home // --------------- // Home of the delivery fd_home_best_p1: "The Best", fd_home_best_p2: "Asian Food", fd_home_best_p3: "Delivery", fd_home_best_button1: "Download the App", fd_home_best_button2: "Partner with Fantuan", fd_home_best_button3: "Deliver with Fantuan", // Our service // refer in the files in delivery/data/DeliveryHome.about_us_carousel_data.js and // delivery/data/DeliveryHome.about_us_carousel_data_zh.js // Our Advantage fd_home_our_header: "Our Advantages", fd_home_our_text: "Partnered with over 4000 high quality merchants and serving over 350,000 users, Fantuan Delivery has covered more than 15 cities and is the largest Asian food delivery platform in North America.", fd_home_our_header1: "Fast Delivery", fd_home_our_text1: "A team of over 3,000 couriers guarantee efficiency", fd_home_our_header2: "Real-Time Order Status", fd_home_our_text2: "Get notifications with real-time order status", fd_home_our_header3: "Various Payment Methods", fd_home_our_text3: "Visa, Mastercard, Debit, Alipay, WeChat Pay and cash", // Our App fd_home_ourapp_header: "Download Our App", fd_home_ourapp_text1: "Life can be complicated - food doesn’t have to be!", fd_home_ourapp_text2: "Enjoy $18 new customer coupons - download now!", // With Fantuan fd_home_with_header1: "Partner with Fantuan", fd_home_with_text1: "Increase your restaurant’s customer base and profits!", fd_home_with_header2: "Deliver with Fantuan", fd_home_with_text2: "Flexible hours, a competitive income!", // Delivery - Partner // ------------------ // Partner with Fantuan fd_partner_with_header: "Partner with Fantuan", fd_partner_with_text: "Eliminate the need for inconvenient phone orders, save human power and exceed your goals - using our intelligent data analysis, you can grow your business quickly!", fd_partner_with_button: "Join Now", // More customer fd_partner_more_title1: "More customers", fd_partner_more_text1: "Fantuan is an excellent opportunity for merchants to develop better brand awareness and leads to an increase in new customers with strong buying power.", fd_partner_more_title2: "No additional costs", fd_partner_more_text2: "We offer our platform and services at no additional costs - you and your business will benefit from our perks and gain extra profits.", fd_partner_more_title3: "Improve restaurant efficiency", fd_partner_more_text3: "With Fantuan, you may fill orders and collect revenue regardless of the available seats in your restaurant - your daily order quantity will increase, along with your profits.", fd_partner_more_title4: "Receive assistance to grow your business", fd_partner_more_text4: "Fantuan’s large user base can provide merchants with additional delivery orders. Online users can also turn into dine-in customers, further expanding your business.", // Count up fd_partner_countup_title1: "Registered Users", fd_partner_countup_text1: "active online users", fd_partner_countup_title2: "Merchant Partners", fd_partner_countup_text2: "partner restaurants", fd_partner_countup_title3: "Delivery Couriers", fd_partner_countup_text3: "delivery staff", // 4steps fd_partner_4steps_title: "4 simple steps to get started", fd_partner_4steps_text: "Fantuan partners can quickly establish market awareness while rapidly growing revenues. ", fd_partner_4steps_title1: "Contact Fantuan", fd_partner_4steps_text1: "Submit application - you will be contacted shortly", fd_partner_4steps_title2: "Sign Contract", fd_partner_4steps_text2: "Our exclusive contract protects your best interests", fd_partner_4steps_title3: "Install Tablet", fd_partner_4steps_text3: "Our software provides order notification and information", fd_partner_4steps_title4: "Operate online", fd_partner_4steps_text4: "Manage your menu and orders, enjoy more exposure", fd_partner_4steps_start: "Get started", fd_partner_4steps_button: "Join Now", // advert fd_partner_advert_title: "Advertise with Fantuan!", fd_partner_advert_text: "Fantuan uses the benefits of our big platform to help you accurately locate your customer base. Our advertising space, for food and other business categories, is the most direct and effective way to increase brand awareness.", fd_partner_advert_button1: "Contact Now", fd_partner_advert_button2: "Media Kit", // Delivery - Partner - Become a Partner // ------------------------------------- fd_partner_become_button: "Join Now", fd_partner_become_title: "Become a Partner", fd_partner_become_area: "Area", fd_partner_become_area_select1: "Greater Vancouver", fd_partner_become_area_select2: "Los Angeles", fd_partner_become_area_select3: "Toronto", fd_partner_become_name: "Name", fd_partner_become_name_ph1: "First Name", fd_partner_become_name_ph2: "Last Name", fd_partner_become_phone: "Phone", fd_partner_become_phone_ph: "Phone Number", fd_partner_become_email: "Email", fd_partner_become_email_ph: "Email Address", fd_partner_become_busname: "Business Name", fd_partner_become_busname_ph: "Business Name", fd_partner_become_busadr: "Business Address", fd_partner_become_busadr_street: "Street Address", fd_partner_become_busadr_city: "City", fd_partner_become_busadr_zip: "ZIP / Postal Code", fd_partner_become_buscat: "Business Category", fd_partner_become_buscat_ph: "Business Category", fd_partner_become_desc: "Description", fd_partner_become_inputcode: "Input code", fd_partner_become_submit: "Submit", fd_partner_become_close: "Close", fd_partner_become_ver_notclear: "Not clear", fd_partner_become_ver_change: "Click to change", // Delivery - Partner - advertise contact // -------------------------------------- fd_partner_become_advert_button: "Contact Now", fd_partner_become_advert_title: "Advertisement for investment", fd_partner_become_advert_close: "Close", // Delivery - Deliver // ------------------ // Deliver flexible fd_deliver_flexible_p1: "Flexible schedule", fd_deliver_flexible_p2: "Competitive income", fd_deliver_flexible_p3: "You could earn $200 a day - your hours are up to you!", fd_deliver_best_button: "Apply Now", // Why deliver with Fantuan fd_deliver_why_header: "Why deliver with Fantuan?", fd_deliver_why_text: "Looking for a job with a competitive income and flexible hours? Become a Fantuan Delivery courier!", fd_deliver_why_header1: "Flexible hours!", fd_deliver_why_text1: "You are your own boss! Enjoy complete freedom in deciding the time to work - the choice is up to you, Monday to Sunday!", fd_deliver_why_header2: "Competitive income!", fd_deliver_why_text2: "Our many daily orders will result in an increase of your income, which you can receive and keep track of conveniently through our driver app!", fd_deliver_why_header3: "More transportation methods", fd_deliver_why_text3: "The choice is yours – provide your own car, electric bike or bicycle, or rent one of our electric bikes to perform your deliveries!", // deliver meet fd_deliver_meet_header: "Meet the people moving Fantuan", fd_deliver_meet_text: "Life can be complicated but ordering food doesn't have to be.", // deliver get start fd_deliver_get_header: "Apply Now!", fd_deliver_get_text1: "Flexible hours and easy money - fill out the application to become a Fantuan Delivery", fd_deliver_get_text2: "courier. We look forward to your joining!", // Delivery - Partner - Become a Deliver // ------------------------------------- fd_deliver_become_button: "Join Now", fd_deliver_become_title: "Become a deliver", fd_deliver_become_area: "Area", fd_deliver_become_area_select1: "Greater Vancouver", fd_deliver_become_area_select2: "Los Angeles", fd_deliver_become_area_select3: "Toronto", fd_deliver_become_name: "Name", fd_deliver_become_name_ph1: "First Name", fd_deliver_become_name_ph2: "Last Name", fd_deliver_become_phone: "Phone", fd_deliver_become_phone_ph: "Phone Number", fd_deliver_become_address: "Address", fd_deliver_become_address_street: "Street Address", fd_deliver_become_address_city: "City", fd_deliver_become_address_zip: "ZIP / Postal Code", fd_deliver_become_schedule_title: "Desired schedule area", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name1: "Metro", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name2: "Lougheed", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name3: "Downtown", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name4: "New West", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name5: "Hasting", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name6: "Richmond", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name7: "Coquitlam", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name8: "Surrey", fd_deliver_become_schedule_name9: "Vancouver", fd_deliver_become_trans_title: "Transportation", fd_deliver_become_trans_name1: "Car (self-provided)", fd_deliver_become_trans_name1: "Electric Motorbike (rent)", fd_deliver_become_trans_name1: "Motorbike (self-provided)", fd_deliver_become_hours_title: "Operating hours", fd_deliver_become_hours_time01: "Mon 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time02: "Tue 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time03: "Wed 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time04: "Thu 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time05: "Fri 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time06: "Sat 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time07: "Sun 11am - 5pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time08: "Mon 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time09: "Tue 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time10: "Wed 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time11: "Thu 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time12: "Fri 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time13: "Sat 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_hours_time14: "Sun 5am - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_desc: "Description", fd_deliver_become_inputcode: "Input code", fd_deliver_become_submit: "Submit", fd_deliver_become_close: "Close", // Delivery - FAQ // -------------- // FAQ fd_faq_header: "FAQ", fd_faq_text: "Have questions? We are here to help! Please find anwsers for some frequently asked questions. If you have further questions, please contact your local Fantuan office.", // FAQ general fd_faq_general_title: "General", fd_faq_general_h1: "1. How do I contact customer service?", fd_faq_general_p1: "You can reach us at 778-833-1131, available 24/7. Our customer service representatives will help you with all your questions.", fd_faq_general_h2: "2. Which restaurants have promotions? What types of promotions do they have?", fd_faq_general_p2: "Promotion information can be found on the Fantuan app on the home page. You can also follow Fantuan's public WeChat account to get the most updated promotions.", fd_faq_general_h3: "3. Why is the estimated delivery time not the same as my order’s actual arrival time?", fd_faq_general_p3: "Fantuan’s average fastest delivery time is around 30 minutes. There are a wide variety of factors that may contribute to a later delivery time:", fd_faq_general_p31: "1) Order queue acceptance: we need to arrange orders in a queue based on the time of their placement - orders at the end of the queue may have extended delivery times.", fd_faq_general_p32: "2) Restaurant preparation time: to prepare certain dishes and/or a large amount meal orders may extend delivery times - restaurants generally take about 20 minutes for meal preparation.", fd_faq_general_p33: "3) Harsh weather: roads become hazardous in harsh weather - this may affect order distribution efficiency and therefore extend delivery times.", fd_faq_general_p34: "4) Distribution accidents: Occasionally, there will be collisions on the road, road repairs, traffic jams, etc., resulting in increased delivery time.", fd_faq_general_p35: "While we cannot control all of these factors, we will do our best to get your order delivered on time and hope to have your understanding and support. Ordering in advance will effectively protect your meal time requirements.

", fd_faq_general_h4: "4. There is a problem with my order - what do I do?", fd_faq_general_p4: "In case of any problems with your order, please contact our customer service team in time to deal with it. If there is a problem with the process of food delivery, like a serious food spill, there will be a compensation. If there is a problem with the quality of the food, our customer service team will help you contact the restaurant for negotiation or compensation.", fd_faq_general_h5: "5. Does Fantuan provide an invoice/receipt?", fd_faq_general_p5: "Yes! If you need an invoice/receipt, open your app and find your order in “Order History.” Once you clicked on this order, you should find a button labelled “Receipt” - click here, enter your email address and click “Send Receipt.” You should find your invoice/receipt in your email inbox.", // FAQ account fd_faq_account_title: "Account", // fd_faq_account_h1: "", // fd_faq_account_p1: "", // FAQ courier fd_faq_deliver_title: "Courier", fd_faq_deliver_h1: "1. How do I become a courier for Fantuan?", fd_faq_deliver_p1: "To become a courier for Fantuan, fill out the application at http://xxxxx", fd_faq_deliver_h2: "2. What kind of transportation is used to deliver orders? Do I need to provide my own?", fd_faq_deliver_p2: "Fantuan’s couriers have options - you can either provide your own transportation - car, electric car or bicycle - or rent one of our electric bikes.", fd_faq_deliver_h3: "3. Do I need to have a legal work permit/SIN card to become a courier for Fantuan?", fd_faq_deliver_p3: "Yes, Fantuan requires you having a legal work permit/SIN card to become a courier.", fd_faq_deliver_h4: "4. I am an international student, can I deliver with Fantuan (become a courier)?", fd_faq_deliver_p4: "As long as you have a legal work permit/SIN card, you can deliver with Fantuan!", // FAQ refunds fd_faq_refunds_title: "Refunds", fd_faq_refunds_h1: "1. How can I check that my refund went through?", fd_faq_refunds_p1: "The refund process depends on your bank’s settlement process. You can check your bank statements - some banks will provide a refund while others will directly adjust the previous order amount.", fd_faq_refunds_h2: "2. Do my refund credits expire? When?", fd_faq_refunds_p2: "The credits will expire one year after the date they are issued.", // FAQ partner fd_faq_partner_title: "Partners", fd_faq_partner_h1: "1. How do I partner with Fantuan?", fd_faq_partner_p1: "To become a partner merchant, fill out the application at http:xxxxxx. You can also call your local office.", fd_faq_partner_h2: "2. Will someone be there to answer my questions when I sign the contract?", fd_faq_partner_p2: "Someone from our team will help answer your questions every step of the way!", fd_faq_partner_h3: "3. How do I participate in Fantuan’s promotions?", fd_faq_partner_p3: "Fantuan will have various online and offline promotions every month. To participate, find your local Fantuan marketing operations representative. ", // FAQ payment fd_faq_payment_title: "Payment", fd_faq_payment_h1: "1. What payment methods does Fantuan accept?", fd_faq_payment_p1: "Fantuan accepts the following payment methods:", fd_faq_payment_p11: ". cash", fd_faq_payment_p12: ". Interac - supports debit card", fd_faq_payment_p13: ". Visa and MasterCard", fd_faq_payment_p14: ". WeChat payment", fd_faq_payment_p15: ". Alipay (only through Fantuan app)", fd_faq_payment_h2: "2. Why can’t my debit card pay successfully?", fd_faq_payment_p2: "Please check if your debit card has a Visa or MasterCard symbol on it - if it does, please select Visa/MasterCard payment method.", // FAQ membership points fd_faq_member_title: "Membership Points", fd_faq_member_h1: "1. How do I get my membership points?", fd_faq_member_p1: "1) After successfully placing an order, you will earn points equal to your order amount", fd_faq_member_p11: "2) Go to the bottom right corner of the app and click on “Account,” then click on “My Tasks” to see how to collect more points", fd_faq_member_p12: "3) Write reviews and collect points on our app!", fd_faq_member_h2: "2. What can I do with my points?", fd_faq_member_p2: "Go to the bottom right corner of the app and click on “Account,” then click on “Points” to see what you can exchange for your points" }; export default en_US;

sourcesContent:

Fantuan is one of the top Asian life-services platforms in North America, currently covering Vancouver, Toronto, Edmonton, Calgary, Montreal, Seattle, Los Angeles, New York and other metropolitan areas across Canada and the US.", // history ft_about_history_title: "Fantuan's Milestones", ft_about_history_year0: "2014 - 11pm", fd_deliver_become_desc: "Description", fd_deliver_become_inputcode: "Input code", fd_deliver_become_submit: "Submit", fd_deliver_become_close: "Close", // Delivery - FAQ // -------------- // FAQ fd_faq_header: "FAQ", fd_faq_text: "Have questions? We are here to help! Please find anwsers for some frequently asked questions. If you have further questions, please contact your local Fantuan office.", // FAQ general fd_faq_general_title: "General", fd_faq_general_h1: "1. How do I contact customer service?", fd_faq_general_p1: "You can reach us at 778-833-1131, available 24/7. Our customer service representatives will help you with all your questions.", fd_faq_general_h2: "2. Which restaurants have promotions? What types of promotions do they have?", fd_faq_general_p2: "Promotion information can be found on the Fantuan app on the home page. You can also follow Fantuan's public WeChat account to get the most updated promotions.", fd_faq_general_h3: "3. Why is the estimated delivery time not the same as my order’s actual arrival time?", fd_faq_general_p3: "Fantuan’s average fastest delivery time is around 30 minutes. There are a wide variety of factors that may contribute to a later delivery time:", fd_faq_general_p31: "1) Order queue acceptance: we need to arrange orders in a queue based on the time of their placement - orders at the end of the queue may have extended delivery times.", fd_faq_general_p32: "2) Restaurant preparation time: to prepare certain dishes and/or a large amount meal orders may extend delivery times - restaurants generally take about 20 minutes for meal preparation.", fd_faq_general_p33: "3) Harsh weather: roads become hazardous in harsh weather - this may affect order distribution efficiency and therefore extend delivery times.", fd_faq_general_p34: "4) Distribution accidents: Occasionally, there will be collisions on the road, road repairs, traffic jams, etc., resulting in increased delivery time.", fd_faq_general_p35: "While we cannot control all of these factors, we will do our best to get your order delivered on time and hope to have your understanding and support. Ordering in advance will effectively protect your meal time requirements.

", fd_faq_general_h4: "4. There is a problem with my order - what do I do?", fd_faq_general_p4: "In case of any problems with your order, please contact our customer service team in time to deal with it. If there is a problem with the process of food delivery, like a serious food spill, there will be a compensation. If there is a problem with the quality of the food, our customer service team will help you contact the restaurant for negotiation or compensation.", fd_faq_general_h5: "5. Does Fantuan provide an invoice/receipt?", fd_faq_general_p5: "Yes! If you need an invoice/receipt, open your app and find your order in “Order History.” Once you clicked on this order, you should find a button labelled “Receipt” - click here, enter your email address and click “Send Receipt.” You should find your invoice/receipt in your email inbox.", // FAQ account fd_faq_account_title: "Account", // fd_faq_account_h1: "", // fd_faq_account_p1: "", // FAQ courier fd_faq_deliver_title: "Courier", fd_faq_deliver_h1: "1. How do I become a courier for Fantuan?", fd_faq_deliver_p1: "To become a courier for Fantuan, fill out the application at http://xxxxx", fd_faq_deliver_h2: "2. What kind of transportation is used to deliver orders? Do I need to provide my own?", fd_faq_deliver_p2: "Fantuan’s couriers have options - you can either provide your own transportation - car, electric car or bicycle - or rent one of our electric bikes.", fd_faq_deliver_h3: "3. Do I need to have a legal work permit/SIN card to become a courier for Fantuan?", fd_faq_deliver_p3: "Yes, Fantuan requires you having a legal work permit/SIN card to become a courier.", fd_faq_deliver_h4: "4. I am an international student, can I deliver with Fantuan (become a courier)?", fd_faq_deliver_p4: "As long as you have a legal work permit/SIN card, you can deliver with Fantuan!", // FAQ refunds fd_faq_refunds_title: "Refunds", fd_faq_refunds_h1: "1. How can I check that my refund went through?", fd_faq_refunds_p1: "The refund process depends on your bank’s settlement process. You can check your bank statements - some banks will provide a refund while others will directly adjust the previous order amount.", fd_faq_refunds_h2: "2. Do my refund credits expire? When?", fd_faq_refunds_p2: "The credits will expire one year after the date they are issued.", // FAQ partner fd_faq_partner_title: "Partners", fd_faq_partner_h1: "1. How do I partner with Fantuan?", fd_faq_partner_p1: "To become a partner merchant, fill out the application at http:xxxxxx. You can also call your local office.", fd_faq_partner_h2: "2. Will someone be there to answer my questions when I sign the contract?", fd_faq_partner_p2: "Someone from our team will help answer your questions every step of the way!", fd_faq_partner_h3: "3. How do I participate in Fantuan’s promotions?", fd_faq_partner_p3: "Fantuan will have various online and offline promotions every month. To participate, find your local Fantuan marketing operations representative. ", // FAQ payment fd_faq_payment_title: "Payment", fd_faq_payment_h1: "1. What payment methods does Fantuan accept?", fd_faq_payment_p1: "Fantuan accepts the following payment methods:", fd_faq_payment_p11: ". cash", fd_faq_payment_p12: ". Interac - supports debit card", fd_faq_payment_p13: ". Visa and MasterCard", fd_faq_payment_p14: ". WeChat payment", fd_faq_payment_p15: ". Alipay (only through Fantuan app)", fd_faq_payment_h2: "2. Why can’t my debit card pay successfully?", fd_faq_payment_p2: "Please check if your debit card has a Visa or MasterCard symbol on it - if it does, please select Visa/MasterCard payment method.", // FAQ membership points fd_faq_member_title: "Membership Points", fd_faq_member_h1: "1. How do I get my membership points?", fd_faq_member_p1: "1) After successfully placing an order, you will earn points equal to your order amount", fd_faq_member_p11: "2) Go to the bottom right corner of the app and click on “Account,” then click on “My Tasks” to see how to collect more points", fd_faq_member_p12: "3) Write reviews and collect points on our app!", fd_faq_member_h2: "2. What can I do with my points?", fd_faq_member_p2: "Go to the bottom right corner of the app and click on “Account,” then click on “Points” to see what you can exchange for your points", } export default en_US;
